resources.string:
Instructions:
Click on either button to encrypt or decrypt your files.
You can choose a single file or multiple files.
The files are encrypted using AES-256.
Disclaimer:\nThis process is not reversible!\nIf you lose your key, you will not have access to your encrypted file!
AES Toolkit was created by Logan McNaughton.\nSource code is available at github.com/loganmc10/aestoolkit
